1: <pb/><e>A ton bit cham Asaf ti'</e> <pb/><t>A Jehová Cham Dios Axac'al Ocok max k'anjabi. Max yawtej eb cajyom bay tx'otx' tx'otx', tac'al bay yichcan, masantac'al bay yayub c'u.</t>
2: <t>A bay tzalan Sión, conob wal tol a' ijan yili, a tu' chi tx'ox Dios is tzekekial.</t>
3: <t>Chi jay co Diosal, palta c'am chi jay yin numanil. A bay satak Cham ay jun k'ak'ej tol c'aywajwom. A bay yinlak Cham ay jun owal cak'ek'.</t>
4: <t>Ata bay can chi yawtej Dios satcan, c'al tx'otx' tx'otx', yet watx' chi yil eb yoc beyc'ulal yin is conob.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Chi yal Cham: Wajek aj eb wet-xa ayin, eb max ak'on jun xajanbal ayin yuj yak'on eb trato wetok, ẍi Cham.</t>
6: <t>Axa satcan chi tx'oxoni tol a Dios Juez ton yin tojolal.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Chi yalon pax Cham: Ex in conob Israel, abxalwanek, watx' ok wut walonc'al tzet yetal ayex. Ayin ton Dios in, e Diosal in ti'.</t>
8: <t>Maj ex wak' cuenta yuj e yofrenda tol che yak'c'alta' ayin, c'al no no' che yak' tz'a bay waltar.</t>
9: <t>C'am chin k'an no ach'ej wacax xol no' jobbil e yuj. C'am no mam chiwo yul e corral chin k'an ayex.</t>
10: <t>Tol wet masanil no' xolakteal no'. Wet c'apax no no' ay xolak witz.</t>
11: <t>Wet masanil no tz'iquin xolak te', c'al masanil tzet yetal chi bil xolak eltzab.</t>
12: <t>Ta ay in wajil, maj mi wal ayex, yujtol wet jun yulyibank'inal ti' yetokc'al masanil tzet yetal ay bay.</t>
13: <t>Tokwal a chibej wacax chin chi', tokwal chi wuc' chiq'uil no mam chiwo.</t>
14: <t>A ofrenda chi wochej, a ton e aloj yuj diosalil ayin. Yunokab tzet che yaltej ayin, ayin tol Axac'al in Ocok.</t>
15: <t>A yet ay e yailal, awtejek in. Ok ex in colo', axa ex, ok in e yiaj can, ẍi Dios.</t>
16: <pb/><t>Axa bay eb yobtakwom chi yal Dios axca ti': ¿Tzet e yalon e yet yin e yalon el in cuybej, ma e yalon el yabixal in trato?</t>
17: <t>Ilab tol c'am chi yal e c'ul chex wak' cuenta, cax c'am yelapnok in k'anej yul e sat.</t>
18: <t>A yet chi jay nak elk'om, toxac'al chex aj txulnaj e toj yetok. A yetok eb ixlom watx'xac'al e yak'oni.</t>
19: <t>A ti e yet, yelc'ulal chex nawi aj k'anej, c'am chex oc wanaj e yalon lek'tial.</t>
20: <t>A yin e yuẍtak, tol junnej e mam e txutx yetok, che yal yobal k'anej yin.</t>
21: <t>Tix masanil e mul ti', c'amto tzet chi wala'. Yuj tu' xan max e na' tol lajan in e yetok; palta ok waloc e mul yin e sat, ok wil-lej oc in sat e yetok.</t>
22: <pb/><t>A ayex chin toj c'ayc'ulal e yuj ti', watx'okab chi yun nachaj el jun ti' e yuj, axa talaj chi yunej, ok ex wak'on coc'axok, cax c'am mactxel ok ex colon el ayin.</t>
23: <t>A mac chi alon yuj diosalil ayin, ay welapnok yul sat. A mactxel ikem ayin, ok in colcan elok, ẍi Dios.</t>
